00036 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00037 require_once('../lib/view.php');
00038 
00039 class Dansguardianlogs extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'dansguardianlogs';
00042 
00043     function Dansguardianlogs()
00044     {
00045         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Among web filter log messages are page denials, virus scan results, denial bypasses or exceptions. However, some details can be found in HTTP proxy logs only, such as the sizes of file downloads if the download manager is engaged.');
00046     }
00047     
00055     function FormatDate($date)
00056     {
00057         return date('Y').'.'.$date['Month'].'.'.$date['Day'];
00058     }
00059 
00062     function FormatDateArray($datestr, &$date)
00063     {
00064         global $MonthNumbers;
00065 
00066         if (preg_match('/^(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+)$/', $datestr, $match)) {
00067             $date['Month']= $match[2];
00068             $date['Day']= $match[3];
00069             return TRUE;
00070         }
00071         else if (preg_match('/(\w+)\s+(\d+)/', $datestr, $match)) {
00072             if (array_key_exists($match[1], $MonthNumbers)) {
00073                 $date['Month']= sprintf('%02d', $MonthNumbers[$match[1]]);
00074                 $date['Day']= sprintf('%02d', $match[2]);
00075                 return TRUE;
00076             }
00077         }
00078         return FALSE;
00079     }
00080     
00081     function FormatLogCols(&$cols)
00082     {
00083         $link= $cols['Link'];
00084         if (preg_match('|^(http://[^/]*)|', $cols['Link'], $match)) {
00085             $linkbase= $match[1];
00086         }
00087         $cols['Link']= '<a href="'.$link.'" title="'.$link.'">'.wordwrap($linkbase, 40, '<br />', TRUE).'</a>';
00088         $cols['Scan']= wordwrap($cols['Scan'], 40, '<br />', TRUE);
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 $View= new Dansguardianlogs();
